name: ShallNotDig
description:
As a miner you are trying to dig even deeper in the ground, when you accidentaly hit a lava well. As the lava is rising fast, the miner has to run fast to not get burnt. To raise the score the miner has to collect as many crystals as possible. This would not be too hard, but there is a labyrinth of tunnels. Chosing the wrong one means death. The only safety is to find the lift or the expensive portal.

Developed for the 1UP Jam 2020

Developer:

  • Christian Stockinger
  • Clemens Wolf
  • Gerrit Blümel

All assets were created by us except the sound.
